verses.roman:
bhāgavatera 'brahma-stave'ra śloka paḍilā
śloka-śeṣe dui akṣara-pāṭha phirāilā

synonyms: bhāgavatera—from Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; brahma-stavera—of the prayers of Lord Brahmā; śloka—a verse; paḍilā—recited; śloka-śeṣe—at the end of the verse; dui akṣara—of two syllables; pāṭha—the reading; phirāilā—changed.
translation: He began to quote one of Lord Brahmā's prayers from Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam, but he changed two syllables at the end of the verse.
